item.title: CVS 在与 Glenview Capital 的交易中新增四名董事会成员
item.description: CVS Health 周一表示，根据与 Glenview Capital Management 达成的协议，公司董事会将新增四名成员，其中包括该对冲基金的首席执行官拉里-罗宾斯（Larry Robbins）。【原文：CVS Health said on Monday it would add four new members to its board in an agreement with Glenview Capital Management, including the hedge fund's chief executive Larry Robbins.】

item.title: 早间竞价：伤痕累累的华尔街对英伟达保持警惕
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 前一周下跌后，期货价格涨跌互现，市场焦点重新回到盈利上
item.description: 周一，美国股票期货涨跌不一，投资者在等待关键企业的业绩，尤其是英伟达（Nvidia）的业绩，此前一周华尔街股市大幅下跌。【原文：U.S. stock futures were mixed on Monday, as investors awaited key corporate results, particularly from Nvidia, following significant declines on Wall Street the previous week.】

item.title: 销售增长放缓，英伟达黑科技收入成焦点
item.description: 在过去的八个季度里，英伟达（Nvidia）的营收都超过了华尔街的预期。但由于分析师预计增长速度将放缓，该公司如何克服延迟和供应链问题来销售其最新的人工智能芯片，很可能成为其股价的晴雨表。【原文：Nvidia has bested lofty Wall Street revenue expectations for the past eight quarters. But as analysts expect a slower pace of growth, how the company overcomes delays and supply chain issues to sell its latest AI chips is likely to be a barometer for its stock price.】

item.title: 医疗补助助推诺和诺德、礼来减肥药在美国上市
item.description: 据路透社共享的一份分析报告显示，美国政府的医疗保险计划为流行的减肥新药提供了大部分保险，远远超出了私人雇主和保险公司的报销范围。【原文：U.S. government health plans account for the lion's share of coverage for popular new weight-loss drugs, far beyond the reimbursement available from private employers and insurers, according to an analysis shared with Reuters.】

item.title: 阿根廷投资者在米莱伊当选一年后将赌注押在他的受欢迎程度上
item.description: 投资者因押注阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱伊而获得回报，他们正加倍押注该国的股票和债券，即使这些股票和债券创下历史纪录，他们押注紧缩政策将带来更多红利。【原文：Investors who have been rewarded for their bets on Argentine President Javier Milei are doubling down on the country's stocks and bonds even as they hit records, betting that an austerity crusade will pay further dividends.】

item.title: 精神航空公司申请破产
item.description: 精神航空公司（Spirit Airlines）周一披露，该公司已申请破产保护，在此之前，这家美国免票旅行先驱一直在季度亏损和巨额债务中挣扎。【原文：Spirit Airlines has filed for bankruptcy protection after the pioneer of no-frills travel in the U.S. struggled with a long run of quarterly losses and significant debt, it disclosed on Monday.】

item.title: 野村预计美联储将在 12 月暂停降息周期
item.description: 野村证券（Nomura）表示，预计美国联邦储备委员会将不再在 12 月的政策会议上降息，这也是唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得大选后首家发出暂停央行降息周期信号的全球券商。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve is no longer expected to cut interest rates at its December policy meeting, Nomura has said, making it the first global brokerage to signal a pause in the central bank's rate-cutting cycle in the wake of Donald Trump's election win.】

item.title: 小米首席执行官：SU7 交付量突破 10 万台，年底目标 13 万台
item.description: 小米公司首席执行官雷军周一表示，其旗舰电动汽车系列 SU7 的交付量已突破 10 万辆。【原文：Xiaomi CEO Lei Jun said on Monday that deliveries of its flagship electric vehicle series SU7 has surpassed 100,000 units.】

item.title: 独家报道：受危机影响的电动汽车电池冠军 Northvolt 努力实现生产目标
item.description: 据公司内部文件和公司消息来源称，陷入困境的绿色科技公司 Northvolt 已错过了一些内部目标，并已削减了其位于瑞典北部的电池电池厂的产量，这凸显了提高产量所面临的挑战。【原文：Embattled green tech player Northvolt has missed some in-house targets and has curtailed production at its battery cells plant in northern Sweden, according to internal company documents and company sources, underscoring the challenge of ramping up output.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长纳格尔称特朗普关税可能对通胀影响不大
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）决策者约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普承诺的关税将颠覆国际贸易，但最终可能对通胀产生 "轻微影响"。【原文：The tariffs promised by U.S. President-elect Donald Trump would upend international trade but may ultimately have a "minor impact" on inflation, European Central Bank policymaker Joachim Nagel said.】

item.title: Airbnb 敦促巴塞罗那重新考虑打击旅游租赁
item.description: 全球度假屋租赁公司 Airbnb 敦促巴塞罗那市长重新考虑扩大对短租的打击力度，认为这只会让酒店业受益，却无法解决过度旅游和住房危机问题。【原文：Global holiday home rental company Airbnb has urged Barcelona's mayor to rethink a widening crackdown on short-term rentals, arguing that it only benefits the hotel sector while failing to address overtourism and a housing crisis.】

item.title: 帝亚吉欧力推零酒精啤酒，价格上涨为健力士的竞争对手提供了机会
item.description: 帝亚吉欧（Diageo）需要其领先的黑啤酒健力士（Guinness）保持快速增长，并正在推出零酒精替代品。但价格上涨正在使一些英国顾客望而却步，并为喜力的墨菲啤酒等竞争对手敞开了大门。【原文：Diageo needs its leading stout beer Guinness to keep growing fast and is pushing a zero alcohol alternative. But price hikes are turning off some UK customers and opening the door to rivals such as Heineken's Murphy's.】

item.title: 聚焦：障碍重重，全球海上风电产业有望错失重大目标
item.description: 经过一年的取消项目、损坏涡轮机和放弃租赁销售之后，全球海上风能产业已不再有多少机会实现美国、欧洲和其他国家政府设定的崇高目标，这标志着应对气候变化的努力遭遇挫折。【原文：After a year of canceled projects, broken turbines, and abandoned lease sales, the global offshore wind industry no longer has much chance to hit the lofty targets set by governments in the U.S., Europe and elsewhere, marking a setback for efforts to fight climate change.】

item.title: 芯片强国台湾呼吁与欧盟达成经济伙伴关系协议
item.description: 台湾总统赖清德周一呼吁与欧盟签署经济伙伴关系协议，称这将促进半导体领域的合作，而且作为民主国家，双方应携手合作。【原文：Taiwan President Lai Ching-te called on Monday for the signing of an economic partnership agreement with the European Union, saying it would boost cooperation in semiconductors and that as democracies the two sides should be working together.】

item.title: 独家：印度中央银行计划 2025 年推出云服务，对抗全球企业的主导地位
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，印度央行将于2025年启动一项试点计划，以可承受的价格向金融公司提供本地云数据存储服务。【原文：India's central bank will launch a pilot programme in 2025 offering local cloud data storage to financial firms at affordable prices, according to two sources aware of the matter, who declined to be identified as conversations are confidential.】

item.title: 聚焦：欧洲石油巨头退出可再生能源之路
item.description: 近五年前，英国石油公司开始雄心勃勃地尝试从一家石油公司转型为一家专注于低碳能源的企业。【原文：Almost five years ago, BP embarked on an ambitious attempt to transform itself from an oil company into a business focused on low-carbon power.】

item.title: 澳大利亚竞争监管机构开始审查 Vocus-TPG 34 亿美元交易
item.description: 澳大利亚竞争监管机构周一表示，正在就麦格理支持的电信集团 Vocus 以 52.5 亿澳元（33.9 亿美元）收购当地电信运营商 TPG Telecom 的企业、政府和批发（EG&W）固定业务及光纤网络资产一事征求意见。【原文：Australia's competition regulator said on Monday it is seeking views on the Macquarie-backed telecommunications group Vocus' A$5.25 billion ($3.39 billion) takeover of local telecom operator TPG Telecom's enterprise, government, and wholesale (EG&W) fixed business and fibre network assets.】

item.title: 欧洲 日本央行对收紧政策持开放态度，但对时机保持缄默
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 中国华为开始接受 Mate 70 智能手机预订
item.description: 中国华为公司周一在其官方微信账号上发表声明，宣布开始接受 Mate 70 智能手机的预订。【原文：China's Huawei on Monday announced that it had started taking pre-orders for its Mate 70 smartphone model, in a statement on its official WeChat account.】

item.title: 特朗普推动的美股反弹遭遇逆风
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在大选中获胜所推动的美股反弹正步履蹒跚，因为投资者要应对从通胀忧虑重现到当选总统政策影响的不确定性等各种问题。【原文：A U.S. stock rally fueled by Donald Trump’s election victory is stumbling, as investors contend with everything from renewed inflation worries to uncertainty over the impact of the president-elect's policies.】

item.title: 行业组织称，预计将有创纪录的 8000 万美国人在感恩节假期出行
item.description: 美国汽车协会（AAA）周一表示，预计美国人的感恩节旅行将创下新纪录，将有近 8000 万人在假期期间上路、搭乘飞机和游轮。【原文：Americans are expected to set a new record for Thanksgiving travel, with nearly 80 million to hit the roads, catch flights and board cruises over the holiday period, travel group AAA said on Monday.】

item.title: 富士康告诉印度招聘人员取消 iPhone 招聘广告中的婚姻状况内容
item.description: 苹果供应商已下令帮助在印度招聘 iPhone 组装工人的招聘代理机构在招聘广告中删除年龄、性别和婚姻标准以及制造商的名称。【原文：The Apple supplier has ordered hiring agents that help recruit iPhone assembly workers in India to remove age, gender and marital criteria as well as the manufacturer's name in job advertisements.】

item.title: 独家报道消息称碧桂园向债权人提交离岸债务重组计划
item.description: 五位熟悉内情的消息人士称，碧桂园已于上月底向部分债权人提交了离岸债务重组方案的初步条款，这家负债累累的中国房地产开发商正努力避免破产清算。【原文：Country Garden submitted the preliminary terms of its offshore debt restructuring proposal to some creditors late last month, said five sources familiar with the matter, as the indebted Chinese property developer tries to avoid liquidation.】

item.title: 英伟达业绩公布前股价上涨；日本央行上田几乎未给出利率暗示
item.description: 本周伊始，全球股市在英伟达（Nvidia）发布备受期待的财报之前表现较为稳健，而日本央行行长的讲话则让市场对该国的利率前景一无所知。【原文：Global stocks began the week on firmer footing ahead of a highly anticipated earnings release from Nvidia , while in Japan, a speech from its central bank's head left markets none the wiser on the country's rate outlook.】

item.title: 俄乌紧张局势升级后油价走高
item.description: 俄罗斯和乌克兰之间的战事在上周末加剧后，油价在周一有所上扬，但对全球第二大消费国中国燃料需求的担忧以及对全球石油过剩的预测对市场构成了压力。【原文：Oil prices edged up on Monday after fighting between Russia and Ukraine intensified over the weekend, although concerns about fuel demand in China, the world's second-largest consumer, and forecasts of a global oil surplus weighed on markets.】

item.title: 据媒体报道，特朗普增加了更多财政部长候选人
item.description: 据《纽约时报》和《华尔街日报》周日报道，美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普将前美联储理事凯文-沃什（Kevin Warsh）和亿万富翁马克-罗文（Marc Rowan）列入财政部长候选人名单。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump added former Federal Reserve Governor Kevin Warsh and billionaire Marc Rowan to the list of candidates to become his Treasury secretary, the New York Times and Wall Street Journal reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 日本央行暂缓加息，美元兑日元走强
item.description: 美元兑日元周一上涨，此前日本最高央行行长表示将进一步收紧政策，但对时机问题保持开放态度，使市场无法更明确地判断是否会在下个月采取行动。【原文：The dollar rose against the yen on Monday after Japan's top central banker flagged further policy tightening ahead but left open the question of timing, leaving the market no clearer on whether a move would come next month.】

item.title: 日本央行行长认为日本出现工资驱动型通胀的可能性较高
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫表示，日本经济在实现由工资驱动的持续通胀方面正在取得进展，但对于央行是否会在下个月再次加息，上田一夫几乎没有给出任何线索。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda said the economy was making progress in achieving sustained wages-driven inflation, but gave few clues on whether the central bank could raise interest rates again next month.】

item.title: 消息人士称，阿里巴巴旨在通过双币种债券交易融资 50 亿美元
item.description: 据两位直接知情的消息人士透露，中国电子商务巨头阿里巴巴集团正计划通过多期美元和离岸人民币债券融资 50 亿美元。【原文：Chinese ecommerce giant Alibaba Group is aiming to raise $5 billion in multi-tranche dollar and offshore Chinese yuan bonds, according to two sources with direct knowledge of the matter.】
